Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Brainy \Brain"y\ (br[=a]n"[y^]), a. 1. Having an active or vigorous mind. [Colloq.] [1913 Webster]
2. highly intelligent. [PJC]

brainy adj : having or marked by unusual and impressive intelligence; "some men dislike brainy women"; "a brilliant mind"; "a brilliant solution to the problem" [syn: {brilliant}, {smart as a whip}] [also: {brainiest}, {brainier}]
